generated_body: The article titled "U.S. proposes denying work permits to asylum seekers who enter illegally" is likely to discuss the implications of a new policy aimed at regulating work permits for asylum seekers, particularly focusing on those who have entered the country unlawfully. It may outline the rationale behind the proposal, including concerns about legal immigration processes and economic impacts. Additionally, the article could provide insight into how this policy might affect the lives of asylum seekers and the broader immigration landscape in the U.S. Overall, readers can expect an informative overview of the proposed changes and their potential consequences.
